metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45480 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.15.11. There is amemory leak in the __rds_conn_create() function in net/rds/connection.c ina certain combination of circumstances.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
